title: Spam Module
extract: The Akismet Spam Filter. The Akismet spam prevention system is a system that helps prevent spam on your forum. This works by disallowing certain users to post something on your forum if the content appears to be spam, or if the user has been known to spam or many other miscellaneous reasons.May 31, 2018
